#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int Lint;

Lint gcd( Lint a, Lint b ) {
	
	if( ( a % b ) == 0 )
		return b;
	else
		return gcd( b, ( a % b ) );
}

void divByGcd( Lint &a, Lint &b ) {

	Lint m = gcd( a, b );
	a /= m;
	b /= m;
}

Lint NCR( Lint n, Lint k ) {
	
	Lint i, toMult, toDiv, num = 1, deno = 1;
	
	if( k > ( n / 2 ) )
		k = n - k;

	for( i = k;i >= 1;i-- ) {
		
		toMult = n - k + i;
		toDiv = i;
		
		divByGcd( toMult, toDiv );
		divByGcd( toMult, deno );
		divByGcd( num, toDiv );
		
		num *= toMult;
		deno *= toDiv;
	}
	
	return ( num / deno );
}

int main() {
	
	Lint t, n, k;
	
	scanf("%lld", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
	
		scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &k );
		printf("%lld\n", NCR( n, k ) );
	}
	
	return 0;
}
